    • newGUID

      public static String newGUID(String prefix, io.github.tundeadetunji.General.AppendWith append_with_date_string, boolean truncate)
      Constructs a GUID.
      Parameters:
      prefix - what to precede the final string with
      append_with_date_string - add a transformed date string to the final string
      truncate - grabs the first 13 characters only
      Returns:
      string of transformed GUID

    • writeHtml

      public static String writeHtml(String content, String title)
      Constructs a custom HTML snippet, intended to be for preview only. The CSS and JS are based on Shoppy's resources, but defaults to Bootstrap's in syntax.
      Parameters:
      content - this will represent the bulk of the body section of the final markup snippet
      title - the title of the page which will be placed in the title tag of the markup snippet
      Returns:
      HTML that can be placed in HTML file directly to create a (default custom) web page

    • writeHtml

      public static String writeHtml(String content)
      Constructs a custom HTML snippet, intended to be for preview only. The CSS and JS are based on Shoppy's resources, but defaults to Bootstrap's in the absence of Shoppy's.
      Parameters:
      content - this will represent the bulk of the body section of the final markup snippet
      Returns:
      HTML that can be placed in HTML file directly to create a (default custom) web page

    • previewHtml

      public static String previewHtml(String content, String title)
      Custom HTML snippet, intended to be for preview only. The CSS and JS are based on Shoppy template's resources, but defaults to Bootstrap's in the absence of Shoppy's.

      Shoppy Template used: https://w3layouts.com/template/shoppy-e-commerce-admin-panel-responsive-web-template/ License (as at time of this file) at https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

      Parameters:
      content - this will represent the bulk of the body section of the final markup snippet
      title - the title of the page which will be placed in the title tag of the markup snippet
      Returns:
      HTML that can be placed in HTML file directly to create a (default custom) web page

    • previewHtml

    • prepareForIo

      public static String prepareForIo(String str_)
      Transforms a string by replacing escape characters (carriage return, tab, etc.) to the appropriate characters depending on the intended output (defaults to web page).
      Parameters:
      str_ - the string to transform
      Returns:
      string that is safe for direct use for the intended output

    • prepareForIO

      public static String prepareForIO(String str_, General.FormatFor output_)
      Transforms a string by attempting to replace escape characters (carriage return, tab, etc.) to the appropriate characters depending on the intended output specified by output_.
      Parameters:
      str_ - the string to transform
      output_ - the intended output
      Returns:
      string that is safe for direct use for the intended output

    • splitTextInTwo

      public static String splitTextInTwo(String string, String delimiter, General.SideToReturn sideToReturn)
      Splits a string into 2 tokens, each of which represents the string split along what is specified from delimiter.
      Parameters:
      string - the string to split into tokens
      delimiter - what to split the string along
      sideToReturn - should it return the first token or the last token
      Returns:
      a string that is the first or last token
